verses.name: Deuteronomy 27:5
verses.text: And there shalt thou build an altar unto the Lord thy God, an altar of stones: thou shalt not lift up any iron tool upon them.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 27:6
verses.text: Thou shalt build the altar of the Lord thy God of whole stones: and thou shalt offer burnt offerings thereon unto the Lord thy God:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 27:7
verses.text: And thou shalt offer peace offerings, and shalt eat there, and rejoice before the Lord thy God.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 27:8
verses.text: And thou shalt write upon the stones all the words of this law very plainly.
